body.name: Sunzel Womens Flare Leggings with Tummy Control Crossover Waist and Wide Leg
features: Crossover Flare Leggings with No Front Rise Seams - We took one of your favorite pieces and put every girl’s favorite spin on them - NO FRONT SEAM! We know how much you all love our flared leggings and we wanted to make them even chicer! Designed with no side seam or front rise seam for a smooth appearance and enhance your flexibility and comfort.

Buttery Soft Fabrics & Flattering Fits - These medium compression leggings are made with our signature custom durable, ultra-soft, and breathable fabric for a soft, second skin feel and high stretch retention.
Yoga Pants With Crossover Waistband - This style features a subtle V-shaped front waistband and glute-flattering back waistband and sculpt legs that perfectly show off your curves!
High Waist Cut & Seamless - Double lined waistband ensure leggings will stay in place without digging in or rolling down. These squat proof leggings are perfect for your practice and beyond.
Cute go-to leggings, all day comfortable and flattering with the flare pants, easy to dress down or up. Comfortable and flattering outfits to work out or go out with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I usually don’t write reviews just ratings. This is actually the first one I’ve written. I had to write this because I was skeptical of these pants and they ended up being so perfect. I’m 5’8.5 and 120 lbs. I ordered XS & 34”. It’s usually hard for me to find pants that fit well. As a taller girly it’s not easy to find pants small enough that are also long enough. I read so many reviews on these pants. Mostly good but some weird and questionable. First of all the crotch is perfectly fine. No camel toe and no large or messed up stitching. I went back and fourth between S & XS but I knew the pants were supposed to be stretchy so I went with the XS. I’m glad I did because they fit perfectly. I will wear them with my chunky sneakers. When I have my shoes on they cover the tops of the sneakers which I love. When I have no shoes on they sit on the ground which I also love. The length is PERFECT. The flare is bigger than I thought it would be but it’s very flattering. When I initially took the pants out of the bag I was worried the flare would be too much but it’s not at all. It’s very nice. No sheer or see through but I also have the color black so it might not be like that for lighter colors. The texture is nice and soft. It’s thin but not as thin as I thought it would be. Just your basic work out material really. I won’t wear these to work out in but they would definitely be fine for that. They’re breathable, comfortable and flexible. If you’re looking for something for cold weather these aren’t it but I’m not. The crossover waist is SOOO CUTE. My waist is snatched in and it doesn’t roll over or anything. Its regular high waist not too high and the crossover makes them show more stomach than regular straight waist pants which is so flattering. The waist isn’t too tight. I probably could’ve fit the small. But I’m happy with the XS and will definitely order more in a different color. I’ll probably gift these for my sister around the holidays as well. I have an event coming up that I needed these for and ordered them later than I should’ve however they came in a day earlier than expected which was awesome. There are no holes, weird spots or crooked stitching. I could definitely wear these to bed they’re so comfortable. I really am so so happy with them and can’t wait to wear them. I already know I will get so many wears out of these. I would say they fit true to size and are nice and stretchy even though they fit snug. If your questioning weather to get them or not I would say go for it! They are PERFECT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and comfy
reviews.reviewText: So stretchy and smooth. Not see-through! The flares are nice and pronounced. Super cute and breathable enough for casual wear and light workouts.I'm 5'3" and the 32" inseam is a bit long on me but they actually stay up and it's not noticeable if you scrunch them up around the waist and thighs because the material is nice and thin.I would not say they have tummy control but this makes them super comfortable (not tight or restricting) and they are super flattering and don't cut into the tummy at all.My measurements are 29 waist and 39 hip and got the size Medium and they fit well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Soft, great length, beautiful color most importantly great stitching on the seams. For those with thicker thighs that rub together and wear your bottoms. no worries, these seams are going to hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin but not sheer, perfect flare, pet hair resistant!
reviews.reviewText: Ok, so these are not going to keep you warm in winter, but they look soooooo good! The fabric crossover at the waist is flattering and gives you that hourglass illusion. Although the fabric is kind of thin, I found that cellulite does not show in the black. The fabric is somewhat slick so pet hair brushes off pretty easily, however, I wouldn't say that the fabric is overly shiny, so I don't feel like I am wearing a pair of jazz pants like I did for dance as a kid. They do not have a front seam. Hooray!!! No camel here! The 32 in inseam worked great for me as I am 5 ft 4 in and like wearing these with a sneaker. I typically wear a size 0/2 or an XS. The XS fit great and was true to size for me. There is plenty of stretch in the fabric, so in my opinion there is no need to size up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very similar to Aerie leggings
reviews.reviewText: I am 160 lbs 5'5 athletic built with thick thighs and a booty, these are very flattering. I got a medium! Leggins are perfect length and feel very soft. Not see through either. I wish the band would have a bit more control, I have to keep pulling them up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels like offline leggings
reviews.reviewText: These pants are very comfortable and soft. Fabric is very similar to aerie offline leggings, the seams are similar as well. This fabric is soft, smooth, stretchy and very comfortable.I got the color brown and expected it to be more of a chocolate brown and it’s more of dark brown, I just didn’t pay attention to the color too much. I still like these though.I’m 5’4, 125-130 ish, size 2-4, the size I got fit me perfectly. The waist band doesn’t roll over when I slouch and it’s comfortable. Not much compression to it, just sits nicely on the waist. They’re not see through in any way.Overall, I do recommend these pants!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tall ladies! Love them!!
reviews.reviewText: I was little skeptical at first because I’m 5’10” and most leggings are not long enough. These actually hit the floor which is impressive. They are butter soft and passed the bend over test…woohoo 😉. I love the belly band because it gives the perfect amount of support and not restricting. Flattering too! I’ll be buying a couple more in different colors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great leggings but with caveats
reviews.reviewText: i got a pair of the bubblegum pink color. they will be difficult to wear seamlessly unless you wear only skin-colored no-show panties (dark-colored thongs will still show like a slight ghost) also, don’t hike the leggings’ waist up too much if you wanna avoid camel toe. other than that, these leggings will be workout and casual-wear safe. the overlap ‘v’ design is very cute. leggings are fantastic color, quality, and feel amazing, and the length is perfect (i’m 5’5 and got 34” inseam bc i don’t mind the extra length, 32” inseam is more accurate for my height range). i highly recommend these leggings if the above caveats won’t be a bother to you
La tela es muy suave y cómoda, estoy acostumbrada a leggins con control de estómago, este es muy cómodo y no saca longitas

reviews.reviewTitle: The Perfect Fit for Any Day
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Sunzel Flare Leggings, and I must say, they've become an essential part of my daily wardrobe. These leggings are a real game-changer!One of the standout features for me is the perfect length. As someone who's 5'2" and weighs 179 lbs, I often struggle with finding leggings that fit just right. These, however, hit the mark. No need to deal with extra fabric pooling around my ankles; they provide an ideal, flattering length.What's truly impressive about these leggings is their combination of tummy control and a high-waisted design. It's like a gentle hug that provides support and smoothes out any areas of concern. These leggings manage to be both comfortable and stylish, a rare feat.The wide leg design is a nice departure from the usual slim-fit options. It adds a touch of elegance and makes these leggings suitable for yoga sessions as well as casual wear.The fabric quality is another selling point. It's substantial and durable, yet breathable, ensuring these leggings hold up well over time.As for the fit, I can confirm that these leggings are true to size. They hug the right curves without feeling restrictive, thanks to the stretch in the fabric. I've felt confident and comfortable in them, whether I'm working out or just going about my daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fit is so flattering, high waisted, soft material, and long in length as im 5.9 generally a size 12 so went for medium. Bought another pair straight away because of how flattering they are
Excelente calidad,talla adecuada 100%recomendados,llego a tiempo mi pedido

The media could not be loaded. not my first pair of sunzels but my first pair of their flares and the cross seamless flare at that. And I am obsessed with a capital O. Will be buying more, purchased the dark brown and they are INSANE. Thinner material but its great for keeping cool during leg day or spring and summer workouts/ errands. They are so flattering, so comfortable and i absolutely love. I am 5 feet tall, so I got the 30' inch and they are perfect for me. Love that they have a height range for short and tall girls! I got an XS and they fit flawlessly. Lots of stretch to them. True to size. Get your normal size. If your inbetween, go smaller for the dark colours and up for any light colours.Update: i got them in the black as well: so comfy. Very very very similar feeling as lulu aligns: even better than lulu aligns imo
